quote: There is a master way with words which is not learned but is instead developed: a deaf man develops exceptional vision, a blind man exceptional hearing, a silent man, when given a piece of paper...
quote_letters: THERE IS A MASTER WAY WITH WORDS WHICH IS NOT LEARNED BUT IS INSTEAD DEVELOPED A DEAF MAN DEVELOPS EXCEPTIONAL VISION A BLIND MAN EXCEPTIONAL HEARING A SILENT MAN WHEN GIVEN A PIECE OF PAPER
